source: TEXT_BANAMA107_01228_SEQ_00<tab>Fibubb Gah requests your assistance in testing a new remedy.

TEXT_BANAMA107_01228_SEQ_01<tab>Fibubb Gah has entrusted you with the Brotherhood of Ash's latest weapon in their kin war─a possible remedy for the madness of the tempered. Subdue the tempered found at the tempering ground in northern Zanr'ak, and test the efficacy of the sacred ash.
target: TEXT_BANAMA107_01228_SEQ_01<tab>Fibubb Gah vous a parlé d'un prototype de remède contre la subjugation. Il vous a demandé de tester <var 33 ((EventItem)) 06F61E89270202 /var> sur trois subjugués que vous trouverez en inspectant les environs de <var 33 ((EObj)) 0DF61E90DE0302 /var>. Vous devrez les vaincre avant de tester la potion.

source: TEXT_BANAMA107_01228_SEQ_02<tab>You have tested the sacred ash on the tempered with uncertain results. Return to the Ring of Ash and report to Fibubb Gah.
target: TEXT_BANAMA107_01228_SEQ_02<tab>Vous avez pu tester la potion conformément aux in<var 16 /var>struc<var 16 /var>tions de Fibubb Gah. Hélas, l'issue ne semblait pas concluante. Retournez lui faire un compte rendu de l'expérience.

source: TEXT_BANAMA107_01228_SEQ_03<tab>Though disappointed at the remedy's apparent failure, Fibubb Gah vows that the Brotherhood will continue its efforts toward creating a cure for the tempered. He muses that perhaps you just might be the one who tests the first successful batch.
target: TEXT_BANAMA107_01228_SEQ_03<tab>Vous avez raconté l'expérience à Fibubb Gah. Il est déçu du résultat, mais s'est juré de poursuivre les recherches.

source: TEXT_BANAMA107_01228_TODO_00<tab>Head to the tempering ground in northern Zanr'ak, and use the sacred ash on subdued tempered.
target: TEXT_BANAMA107_01228_TODO_00<tab>Inspecter <var 33 ((EObj)) 03F61E90DE0302 /var> au nord de Zanr'ak, vaincre les subjugués et utiliser <var 33 ((EventItem)) 03F61E89270202 /var> sur eux
TEXT_BANAMA107_01228_TODO_01<tab>Faire un rapport à Fibubb Gah

source: TEXT_BANAMA107_01228_FIBUBBGAH_000_001<tab>Honored ally, the Brotherhood of Ash has toiled to create a new weapon to use against our enemies─bone ash imbued with spiritual energy by the sacred chants of our mystics.
target: TEXT_BANAMA107_01228_FIBUBBGAH_000_001<tab>Salutations, puissant<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> guerri<var 08 E905 ((ère)) ((er)) /var>. Un onguent mis au point par la Ligue, ceci est. Toujours à l'essai, ce remède est.

source: TEXT_BANAMA107_01228_FIBUBBGAH_000_002<tab>It is our hope that the purifying properties of the ash will serve to cleanse the tempered of Ifrit's malign influence. This remedy has, however, yet to be tested.
target: TEXT_BANAMA107_01228_FIBUBBGAH_000_002<tab>Guérir les Épurés, cette potion pourra peut-être. De remèdes, les malades ont besoin. Des expériences, nous devons mener pour tester nos décoctions.

source: TEXT_BANAMA107_01228_FIBUBBGAH_000_003<tab>It is with bitter fortune, then, that we learned of a raid to the south. It seems that a hunting party from Forgotten Springs was ambushed by a superior force, and dragged before the Lord of the Inferno for tempering.
target: TEXT_BANAMA107_01228_FIBUBBGAH_000_003<tab>Notre chance, le malheur des autres est parfois. Une attaque de nos ennemis, les Miqo'tes de l'Oasis oubliée ont subi. Des Épurées, nombre d'entre elles sont devenues. Une occasion inespérée, cela est.

source: TEXT_BANAMA107_01228_FIBUBBGAH_000_004<tab>I ask that you locate these unfortunate Miqo'te, and sprinkle upon each a pinch of the ash.
target: TEXT_BANAMA107_01228_FIBUBBGAH_000_004<tab>Près d'<var 33 ((EObj)) 02F61E90DE0202 /var>, les victimes se trouvent. Une excellente occasion de tester <var 33 ((EventItem)) 07F61E89270202 /var>, cela est. Te rendre sur place et ex<var 16 /var>pé<var 16 /var>ri<var 16 /var>men<var 16 /var>ter, tu vas.

source: TEXT_BANAMA107_01228_FIBUBBGAH_000_005<tab>Be sure to pacify the rangers sufficiently first, otherwise our unwilling subjects will simply shake off the ash before it has time to take effect.
target: TEXT_BANAMA107_01228_FIBUBBGAH_000_005<tab>Une condition à l'efficacité de cette préparation, il y a cependant. Vaincu et soumis, le subjugué doit être au moment de l'utilisation du remède.

source: TEXT_BANAMA107_01228_FIBUBBGAH_000_011<tab>Find the tempered Miqo'te, and sprinkle a pinch of sacred ash upon each one to determine the remedy's efficacy. Do not forget to subdue your opponents thoroughly before attempting to use the ash!
target: TEXT_BANAMA107_01228_FIBUBBGAH_000_011<tab>Rends-toi près <var 33 ((EObj)) 0AF61E90DE0202 /var>. Sur les subjugués, <var 33 ((EventItem)) 03F61E89270202 /var> utilise. Vaincu, le subjugué doit être au moment de l'utilisation du remède.

source: TEXT_BANAMA107_01228_FIBUBBGAH_000_021<tab>So...it seems the sacred ash failed to have the desired effect. Our mystics will be most disappointed.
target: TEXT_BANAMA107_01228_FIBUBBGAH_000_021<tab>De tes efforts, je te remercie. Un échec, cette potion est malheureusement... Frustrante, cette situation est.

source: TEXT_BANAMA107_01228_FIBUBBGAH_000_022<tab>But the Brotherhood of Ash does not buckle at the slightest sign of hardship! We shall learn from this failure, and redouble our efforts to concoct a cure. You may yet be the first to reclaim a tempered mind from the abyss of madness.
target: TEXT_BANAMA107_01228_FIBUBBGAH_000_022<tab>Lointain le succès est encore, sans nul doute. Mais ferme, notre détermination demeure. Quelque chose, cet échec nous apprendra. De ton aide, je te remercie<var 1D /var>!
TEXT_BANAMA107_01228_POP_MESSAGE_000_000<tab>Action impossible. Vous devez d'abord abattre tous les ennemis.
